subject: Politics
title: Why Ideologies Matter
description: A quick win: understand Why Ideologies Matter.

hook.text: You might say 'I'm not political.' But you have beliefs about taxes, freedom, and fairness. That's ideology.

buildup.text: Ideology is a framework of ideas about how society should be organized and who should hold power.

discovery.text: Ideologies shape policies. Whether a country builds hospitals or armies depends on which ideology wins.

twist.text: The most powerful ideologies are invisible. You don't notice them because they feel like common sense.

climax.text: Understanding ideologies helps you see why people disagree â€” and why politics is never just about facts.

punchline.text: Everyone has an ideology. The question is whether you chose it.

quiz.question: Why are the most powerful ideologies described as 'invisible'?
options: They feel like common sense so people don't notice them
They are kept secret by governments
